tweet: Charles Hoskinson said in 2019 #ADA is planning to catch up regarding functionality and utility, and hopes that entire industry will take cues from Cardano’s development and growth. Finally, he’s hoping #Cardano will get back in top 5 cryptos  by market cap – we hope so too!

From the latest @IOHK_Charles video: There will be a fork in Cardano in Q1 to move to Ouroboros BFT followed by a slow transition of the block creation from BFT nodes to stake pools. The end-result will be a full transition to a decentralized Ouroboros Genesis.
